text: Hatta ke jab woh guroob e aftaab(sunset) ki hadd tak pahunch gaya to usne Suraj ko ek kalay pani mein doobte dekha aur wahan usey ek qaum mili. Humne kaha â€œaey Zul-Qarnain, tujhey yeh maqdarat (power) bhi haasil hai ke inko takleef pahunchye aur yeh bhi ke inke saath neik rawayya ikhtiyar kareyâ€
